institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Ministry of Employment and Labor Consignment Project Subsidy Processing Rules/Article 1 (Purpose)
contents: Article 1 (Purpose) This rule applies to payments made pursuant to Article 27 of the Employment Insurance Act, Article 145 (3) No. 1 of the Enforcement Decree of the same Act, Article 60 of the Enforcement Rules of the same Act, and Article 3 (2) of the Accounting Regulations. The purpose is to stipulate necessary matters regarding payment of employer ability development support funds, etc.
